forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
